trans-unit.source: Install or update a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] deployment on a computer.
trans-unit.target: Instalar ou atualizar um [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] implantação em um computador.

trans-unit.source: You can use InPlaceHostingManager to write programs that install [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] applications programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar InPlaceHostingManager para gravar programas que instalam [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] aplicativos por meio de programação.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use this class in a controlled system management software (SMS) environment or in situations where you need a complex installation that performs a number of pre-installation or post-installation operations on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode usar essa classe em um ambiente de software (SMS) de gerenciamento controlada do sistema ou em situações em que você precisa de uma instalação complexas que realiza uma série de operações de pré-instalação ou pós-instalação no computador local.

trans-unit.source: Generally, you will want to use the members of this class in a specific order: 1.
trans-unit.target: Em geral, você deve usar os membros dessa classe em uma ordem específica: 1.

trans-unit.source: Create a new instance of InPlaceHostingManager.
trans-unit.target: Crie uma nova instância da InPlaceHostingManager.

trans-unit.source: Download the deployment manifest by using <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Baixe o manifesto de implantação usando <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Check that the application can be run with the appropriate permissions by using <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Verifique se o aplicativo pode ser executado com as permissões apropriadas usando <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>

trans-unit.source: Download and install the application by using <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Baixar e instalar o aplicativo usando <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If you call any of these parameters out of order, they will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: -Se você chamar qualquer um desses parâmetros fora de ordem, eles lançará uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: InPlaceHostingManager can install a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application, but cannot execute it.
trans-unit.target: InPlaceHostingManager pode instalar um [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] aplicativo, mas não é possível executá-lo.

trans-unit.source: Some methods in this class, such as <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Execute%2A>, are reserved for use when downloading a Windows Presentation Foundation-based application that runs inside a Web browser.
trans-unit.target: Alguns métodos na classe, como <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Execute%2A>, são reservados para uso durante o download de um aplicativo baseado em Windows Presentation Foundation que é executado dentro de um navegador da Web.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Execute%2A>

trans-unit.source: To use InPlaceHostingManager to download and install applications, you must make sure that the certificate for signing the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] applications you plan to install is already installed on client computers as a trusted publisher.
trans-unit.target: Para usar InPlaceHostingManager para baixar e instalar aplicativos, você deve garantir que o certificado para assinar o [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] aplicativos você planeja instalar já está instalado nos computadores cliente como um editor confiável.

trans-unit.source: For more information on trusted publishers, see [Trusted Application Deployment Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre editores confiáveis, consulte [visão geral de implantação do aplicativo confiável](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > There is currently a product limitation that prevents InPlaceHostingManager from working correctly when you debug your code using [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Atualmente, há uma limitação do produto que impede que InPlaceHostingManager funcione corretamente quando você depurar seu código usando [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: If you debug your application in [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] by using the F5 key, the sample will throw mysterious exceptions when you call <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se você depurar seu aplicativo no [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] usando a tecla F5, o exemplo lançarão exceções misteriosas ao chamar <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: To debug using [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)], start the application without debugging, and then attach the debugger.
trans-unit.target: Depurar usando [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)], inicie o aplicativo sem depuração e, em seguida, anexar o depurador.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use another debugger, such as WinDbg.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, você pode usar outro depurador, como o WinDbg.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager"></xref> to download and install the specified browser-hosted application.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager"> </xref> para baixar e instalar o aplicativo especificado hospedados pelo navegador.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used when you want to download a Windows Presentation Foundation-based application that is hosted in a Web browser.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor é usado quando você deseja baixar um aplicativo baseado em Windows Presentation Foundation que é hospedado em um navegador da Web.

trans-unit.source: To download Windows Forms-based applications that are deployed using [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)], use the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.%23ctor%2A> constructor with the `launchInHostProcess` parameter set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Para baixar aplicativos baseados em Windows Forms que são implantados usando [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)], use o <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.%23ctor%2A>construtor com a `launchInHostProcess` parâmetro definido como `false`.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A Uniform Resource Identifier (<xref:System.Uri>) to a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application's deployment manifest.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador de recurso uniforme (<xref:System.Uri>) para um [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] o manifesto de implantação do aplicativo.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager"></xref> can be used only in Windows XP or in later versions of the Windows operating system.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager"></xref>pode ser usado somente no Windows XP ou em versões posteriores do sistema operacional Windows.

trans-unit.source: Cannot pass for the deploymentManifest argument.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível passar para o deploymentManifest argumento.

trans-unit.source: deploymentManifest uses a URI scheme that is not supported by [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: deploymentManifestusa um esquema URI não é suportado pelo [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager"></xref> to download and install the specified application, which can be either a stand-alone Windows Forms-based application or an application hosted in a Web browser.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager"> </xref> para baixar e instalar o aplicativo especificado, o que pode ser um aplicativo autônomo com base em formulários do Windows ou um aplicativo hospedado em um navegador da Web.

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to the deployment manifest of the application that will be installed.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de URI (Uniform Resource) para o manifesto de implantação do aplicativo que será instalado.

trans-unit.source: Whether this application will be run in a host, such as a Web browser.
trans-unit.target: Se este aplicativo será executado em um host, como um navegador da Web.

trans-unit.source: For a stand-alone application, set this value to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para um aplicativo autônomo, defina esse valor como <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager"></xref> can be used only in Windows XP or in later versions of the Windows operating system.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager"></xref>pode ser usado somente no Windows XP ou em versões posteriores do sistema operacional Windows.

trans-unit.source: Cannot pass for the deploymentManifest argument.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível passar para o deploymentManifest argumento.

trans-unit.source: deploymentManifest uses a URI scheme that is not supported by [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: deploymentManifestusa um esquema URI não é suportado pelo [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application has the appropriate permissions and platform dependencies to run on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] aplicativo tem as permissões apropriadas e dependências de plataforma para ser executado no computador local.

trans-unit.source: You must call AssertApplicationRequirements after <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A> returns successfully.
trans-unit.target: Você deve chamar AssertApplicationRequirements após <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A>retorna com êxito.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must not call <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A> unless you call AssertApplicationRequirements, and it returns without error.
trans-unit.target: Você não deve chamar <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>, a menos que você chamar AssertApplicationRequirements e retorna sem erro.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raised if this method is called before the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync*> method.
trans-unit.target: Gerado se esse método é chamado antes do <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync*>método.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync*>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application has the appropriate permissions and platform dependencies to run on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] aplicativo tem as permissões apropriadas e dependências de plataforma para ser executado no computador local.

trans-unit.source: If `grantApplicationTrust` is `true`, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> will grant the application elevated permissions if it requires them.
trans-unit.target: Se `grantApplicationTrust` é `true`, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>concederá permissões elevadas pelo aplicativo se isso for exigido.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>

trans-unit.source: This is only possible if <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> is able to grant those permissions.
trans-unit.target: Isso só é possível se <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>é capaz de conceder essas permissões.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application is being installed as part of a larger package and the installer has been granted full trust, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> will be able to grant the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application full trust.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] aplicativo está sendo instalado como parte de um pacote maior e o instalador tenha confiança total, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>poderá conceder a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] aplicativo confiança total.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>

trans-unit.source: If `grantApplicationTrust` is `false`, the application will not be granted any permissions.
trans-unit.target: Se `grantApplicationTrust` é `false`, o aplicativo não receberá nenhuma permissão.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the application will attempt to elevate its permissions to the required level.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, o aplicativo tenta elevar as permissões para o nível necessário.

trans-unit.source: Cancels an asynchronous download operation.
trans-unit.target: Cancela uma operação de download assíncrono.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados pelo <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar Dispose quando terminar de usar o <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O método Dispose deixa a <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>em um estado inutilizável.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar Dispose, você deve liberar todas as referências para o <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>para o coletor de lixo possa recuperar a memória que o <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>estava ocupando.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementar um método Dispose](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sempre chamada Dispose antes de liberar sua última referência a <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está usando não serão liberados até que o coletor de lixo chame o <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>do objeto `Finalize` método.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>

trans-unit.source: Downloads an application update in the background.
trans-unit.target: Faz o download de uma atualização do aplicativo em segundo plano.

trans-unit.source: You must call this method after calling <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve chamar este método depois de chamar <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raised if this method is called before the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync*> and <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements*> methods.
trans-unit.target: Gerado se esse método é chamado antes do <> </> *> e <> </> *> métodos.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the application has finished downloading to the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o aplicativo concluiu o download no computador local.

trans-unit.source: If you are installing a Windows Forms-based application, you will need to instruct users to launch the application themselves; you cannot start Windows Forms-based applications programmatically by using the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Execute%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se você estiver instalando um aplicativo baseado em formulários do Windows, você precisará instruir os usuários para iniciar o aplicativo em si; Você não pode iniciar aplicativos baseados em Windows Forms programaticamente usando o <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Execute%2A>método.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Execute%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when there is a change in the status of an application or manifest download.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando há uma alteração no status do download de um aplicativo ou manifesto.

trans-unit.source: In a console application, events are assigned to threads from a thread pool.
trans-unit.target: Em um aplicativo de console, eventos são atribuídos a threads em um pool de threads.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you might receive progress update events out of order, with a subsequent event showing a decrease compared with a previous event.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, você pode receber eventos de atualização de andamento fora de ordem, com um evento subsequente mostrando uma redução em comparação com um evento anterior.

trans-unit.source: You will not see such behavior in a Windows Forms-based application, because events in Windows Forms are processed sequentially out of the user interface (UI) thread's message queue.
trans-unit.target: Você não verá esse comportamento em um aplicativo baseado em Windows Forms, porque eventos em formulários do Windows são processados sequencialmente fora da fila de mensagens do thread da interface do usuário do usuário.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Launches the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application, if and only if it is a Windows Presentation Foundation-based application running in a Web browser.
trans-unit.target: Inicia o [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] aplicativo, se e somente se ele é um aplicativo baseado em Windows Presentation Foundation em execução em um navegador da Web.

trans-unit.source: This method is valid only for Windows Presentation Foundation-based applications that can be hosted in a Web browser (that is, their deployment manifests define the `hostInBrowser` XML element).
trans-unit.target: Este método é válido somente para aplicativos baseados em Windows Presentation Foundation que podem ser hospedados em um navegador da Web (ou seja, seus manifestos de implantação é definir o `hostInBrowser` elemento XML).

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjectHandle"></xref> corresponding to the launched application.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjectHandle"> </xref> correspondente para o aplicativo iniciado.

trans-unit.source: Downloads the deployment manifest of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application in the background, and raises an event when the operation has either completed or encountered an error.
trans-unit.target: Baixa o manifesto de implantação do [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] aplicativo em segundo plano e gera um evento quando a operação foi concluída ou encontrou um erro.

trans-unit.source: To receive notification of when this event completes, create an event handler for the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Para receber notificação de quando esse evento for concluído, criar um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted>evento.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted>

trans-unit.source: If this event is called, and no error is indicated by <xref:System.Deployment.Application.GetManifestCompletedEventArgs>, you should next call <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A> to verify that the application will have permission to run on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Se esse evento é chamado e nenhum erro é indicado por <xref:System.Deployment.Application.GetManifestCompletedEventArgs>, em seguida, você deve chamar <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>para verificar que o aplicativo terá permissão para executar no computador local.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.GetManifestCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the deployment manifest has been downloaded to the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o manifesto de implantação foi baixado no computador local.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property of <xref:System.Deployment.Application.GetManifestCompletedEventArgs> to check whether <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A> completed successfully or returned an error.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Deployment.Application.GetManifestCompletedEventArgs>para verificar se <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A>foi concluída com êxito ou retornou um erro.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.GetManifestCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> is null, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A> completed successfully, and you can call <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>for nulo, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A>concluída com êxito, e você pode chamar <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Removes a previously installed user-defined component of an application.
trans-unit.target: Remove um componente instalado anteriormente definido pelo usuário de um aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a subscription identifier, which indicates the add-in to remove.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém um identificador de assinatura, que indica o suplemento para remover.

trans-unit.source: subscriptionId is not a valid subscription identity, or does not include a name, public key token, processor architecture, and version number.
trans-unit.target: subscriptionIdnão é uma identidade de assinatura válida ou não incluir um nome, token de chave pública, a arquitetura do processador e número de versão.

trans-unit.source: subscriptionId is .
trans-unit.target: subscriptionIdis .

trans-unit.source: Removes a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application that includes the <customUX> element.
trans-unit.target: Remove um [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] aplicativo que inclui o <customUX> elemento.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a subscription identifier, which indicates the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application to remove.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém um identificador de assinatura, que indica o [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] aplicativo a ser removido.
